programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep159
programme.desc: Ron Stays Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Fruit Chews / Opera Cake - Henrys in a Snail Race! But Chef's fruit chews for Henry's mid-race snack are taking too long to set! // After learning Ruby is an amazing opera singer, Chef tries to bake a delicate Opera cake while Olly noisily builds a stage for a Stump concert.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Noodle Bowls - Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep502
programme.desc: The Trophy Chase - The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep719
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. Pancakeio - When Pancakeio the Pancake Wizard takes all the pancakes in Axle City, it's up to Blaze, Stripes, and Starla to become superheroes! Using their Super Wheels, they've got to get those pancakes back- just in time for breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Pups Save the Camping Trip / Pups and the Trouble with Turtles - Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol. // Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and its up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Pups and the Beanstalk / Pups Save the Turbots - Rubble decides to nap under a tree at Farmer Yumis when suddenly Adventure Bay gets a huge problem - Alex the Giant! // When Cap'n Turbot needs to get a picture of a rare bird, his French cousin decides to help but gets caught on a cliff!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Pups Chill Out - Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder - Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep201
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Roller Coaster/The Crew Builds Motor A Play Space - When Speed Meister's rollercoaster sends a pet playdate out of control, Rubble & Crew save the day with a bigger, better, and safer coaster. // The Bark Yard safety inspection is today! But will Motor go boom and cost the Crew a gold safety star?

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Floor Is Guava / We Are The Grumples - Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep226
programme.desc: Saltwater Studios / Sand Crabby - When Baby and his friends are asked to perform at a music festival, they can't decide which genre of song to play. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson solve a crabby mystery.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Dennis Drones On - Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Sharkdog Sitting - While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Fish Fiesta Freakout - Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppas car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dogs garage isnt far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppas car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep224
programme.desc: The Puppet / Gloop Gloop Ah-Ah - The Barbababies decide to create a show and go all out! // Barbotine wants to create the best lemonade.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep225
programme.desc: Living Together / Holey The Snowman - For the very first time, the Barbababies will take the train and sleep in a hotel. // Barbouille crafted a magnificent snowman that the children named Bobo.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep724
programme.desc: The Robot Championship - It's the Robot Championship - and only the fastest, strongest, smartest robot will win! Using coding, can Blaze win enough sports to take home the Robot Championship trophy?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger / Pups Save the Royal Armor - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Paddington's Hero Squad / Paddinton's Knightly Quest - Paddington, Jonathan and Judy gain super powers from a superfood cake, but are they real heroes? // Paddington is on a mission to become a Knight; but he just needs to complete three heroic quests in a day!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep217
programme.desc: The Crew Celebrates Builder Covegiving Day / The Crew Builds A Rocket Ship Ride - After Speed Meister sabotages Builder Covegiving Day, it's up to the pups to save the holiday for everyone in Builder Cove. // Mix dreams about giving the moon a Mix makeover. Rubble and the pups make her dream a reality with a new boardwalk ride!

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Floor Is Guava / We Are The Grumples - Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Celery & Hummus / Lettuce Wraps - Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year. // When Chef and Olly's lettuce goes missing, they become veggie detectives to try and solve the case.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Hide-and-Go-Shark - Max and his friends visit Dad at the aquarium, but can they keep Dad from discovering Sharkdog?

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Green Around the Gills - Max is ready to go on his fun camping trip when Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious illness.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep114
programme.desc: A Storm in Foggy Springs - A terrible storm spooks Sharkdog and he gets loose, threatening to ruin Mom's TV interview.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep301
programme.desc: The Danceathon / What Goes Up - Lannie visits Carnivore Cove and joins Baby and his friends for a dance marathon. // Baby is thrilled to have a new bubbaloon pal until he faces the possibility of losing it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and wont let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampaada? / If The Boot Fits / Piata Party - Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Nopales Tacos / Sloppy Joes - Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales. // When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean. But keeping clean isn't easy when sloppy joes are the dish of the day.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep503
programme.desc: The Island of Lost Treasure - Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep720
programme.desc: Valentine's Day Rescue - It's Valentine's Day! But when Zeg, Darington and Starla get lost on their way to the Valentine's Day party, it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1104
programme.desc: Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch / Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone - Mayor Humdinger is getting dressed for a special day with his Hummy Mummy. // The Museum has a brand-new exhibit: the Emerald Bone-Stone! But when the precious bone goes missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie / Pups Save Ryder - Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea. // Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Pups Save Farmer Alex - Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep202
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Train Station / The Crew Builds A Sierra Sparkle Sign - Rubble & Crew build the first train station in Builder Cove just in time to welcome Farmer Zoe's new cow Mooreen. // Popstar Sierra Sparkle is moving to Builder Cove! But when the pups plan a surprise greeting, Speed Meister makes a plan of his own.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mini Golf Course/The Crew Builds A Butterfly Garden - When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball! // After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away! Will a giant butterfly garden help bring it back?

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom - Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! / Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicua who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep301
programme.desc: The Danceathon / What Goes Up - Lannie visits Carnivore Cove and joins Baby and his friends for a dance marathon. // Baby is thrilled to have a new bubbaloon pal until he faces the possibility of losing it.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Sharkdog, Family - When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep201
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Days of Summer - Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep202
programme.desc: No Fishes in This School - It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing Cuckoo!, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppas friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and Georges teeth are lovely and clean. But Georges plastic toy Mr Dinosaur teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Muddy Puddles - It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Mummy Pig at Work - Peppa accidentally crashes Mummy Pig's computer, so Daddy Pig tries to fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Piggy in the Middle - Peppa teaches George how to catch a ball, and later, they play Monkey in the Middle with Mummy Pig.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Marvelous Moustaches - Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Buttercup - Barbidou's beautiful roses mysteriously disappeared during the night.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep726
programme.desc: School Bus Blaze! - BEEP BEEP! It's time for school in Axle City! But, when the students need help getting to school, it's up to Blaze to save the day by becoming... SCHOOL BUS BLAZE!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? // Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome, but was the rescue as heroic as the stories he tells?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom - Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! / Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicua who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep609
programme.desc: The Great Pizza Race - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S3 Ep304
programme.desc: Chili & Cornbread / Layer Cake - Chef entrusts Olly with his super-special cornbread pan. But things go terribly wrong when she dents it. // Chef and Olly set out to make a cake that breaks the record for most layers ever, but quickly realize how hard it is to make a cake that size.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Poots and Vegetables - Max tries to find something that Sharkdog will eat that isn't fish.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Return of the Nightwalker - Sharkdog and Mia team up in an unlikely pairing to stop Max from sleepwalking right into the ocean!

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Dennis Drones On - Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Goldie's Fintuition / Raising Remy - When Goldie becomes a psychic, Baby and William set out to make her predictions come true. // Baby and William look after a baby reef rabbit and learn how difficult it is to be a parent.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Deep Goo Sea - William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1116
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor / Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists - Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window. // Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.desc: Buttercup - Barbidou's beautiful roses mysteriously disappeared during the night.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Volcanic Island - Grandmaster Glitch is drilling near an underwater volcano in the ocean beside Academy Island in search of some hot bubbly mud.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep113
programme.desc: King - In Teletubbyland, Dipsy is King. Tinky Winky delivers Tubby Custard and Tubby Toast to King Dipsy - whatever King Dipsy wants! Luckily for Tinky Winky they soon swap places.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: I Can Be Anything - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and follow their dreams.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Pop Goes Circus - The friends are joining Hooper's circus school. But when Plom struggles to find a skill he's good at, will he be able to earn his circus school certificate?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Dog Loves Elephant - Dog and Pug meet and Elephant and a mongoose, who cannot play together because they are two completely difference sizes. Dog and Pug solve the problem by helping them to work together.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Moon Landing - Messy accidentally drops his jam sandwich, but why did it fall down and not up? He goes to OKIDO and rockets up to the moon to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Felix Finds His Voice - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy the monster hears a chirping songbird outside his window, but he can't understand what the bird is saying. He goes to OKIDO to find out why all things can't just simply talk the same.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep68
programme.desc: Pretend Piggy - Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep1
programme.desc: It's Time to See a Rainbow - JoJo and Gran Gran get caught in the rain at the park and shelter under the bandstand. JoJo spots a rainbow and discovers that rainbows are only visible when it's rainy and sunny at the same time.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep43
programme.desc: It's time for a special visitor - It is a cold Winter afternoon, the trees are bare and the air is frosty. JoJo and Gran Gran wait for Mummy and Daddy to bring back a special visitor from the airport - Great Gran Gran!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Fluff Bread - Sarah and Duck help the baker bake Shoku-pan, a light and fluffy type of Japanese bread.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Moon Bow - Rainbow gets to experience the night for the first time.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep22
programme.desc: World of Tomorrow - When a pair of crooks steal plans for a great new invention, there is a high-speed chase to try and get them back and allow them to prove their worth.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Butterflies - Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Veg-O-Vision Song Contest - Veg-O-Vision Song Contest

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep29
programme.desc: The Difficult Badge - As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep30
programme.desc: The Cinema Badge - Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep31
programme.desc: The Getting Ready Badge - The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Mountain Gorillas, The Democratic Republic of the Congo - The Go Jetters race to save a family of mountain gorillas from traps left by hunters and also from a sneezy Grandmaster Glitch's germs.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Go Jetter or No Jetter? - Foz starts to think his team doesn't need him anymore. Can Tala convince him he still has what it takes to be a Go Jetter, or will he follow Glitch down a different path?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Mariana Trench: The Pacific Ocean - With the help of his hero Ron Allum, Lars plans to dive to the bottom of the Mariana Trench in a submersible called the Deep Sea Challenger.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Sonny-Mac's Sussex Banoffi Pie - Sonny-Mac has invited his friends to dress up for a tea party where he serves banoffi pie. Thought to have been invented in Sussex, it is made using banana, biscuits, cream and dates.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Andy and the Sooty Tern - Andy heads to the Galapagos Islands in search of a seabird called a sooty tern. Along the way, he meets a fish called a trevally that leaps out of the water trying to catch birds.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep13
programme.desc: Midnight Feast - The pirates would love to have a midnight feast even though Captain Captain forbids it. It states in her pirate handbook that a pirates bedtime is 8 o'clock, so a midnight feast is not an option.

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Craft Book - Lily finds a flight-themed book that has instructions on how to make simple aircrafts.

programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep113
programme.desc: King - In Teletubbyland, Dipsy is King. Tinky Winky delivers Tubby Custard and Tubby Toast to King Dipsy - whatever King Dipsy wants! Luckily for Tinky Winky they soon swap places.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: I Can Be Anything - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and follow their dreams.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Pop Goes Circus - The friends are joining Hooper's circus school. But when Plom struggles to find a skill he's good at, will he be able to earn his circus school certificate?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Dog Loves Elephant - Dog and Pug meet and Elephant and a mongoose, who cannot play together because they are two completely difference sizes. Dog and Pug solve the problem by helping them to work together.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Moon Landing - Messy accidentally drops his jam sandwich, but why did it fall down and not up? He goes to OKIDO and rockets up to the moon to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Felix Finds His Voice - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy the monster hears a chirping songbird outside his window, but he can't understand what the bird is saying. He goes to OKIDO to find out why all things can't just simply talk the same.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep68
programme.desc: Pretend Piggy - Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep1
programme.desc: It's Time to See a Rainbow - JoJo and Gran Gran get caught in the rain at the park and shelter under the bandstand. JoJo spots a rainbow and discovers that rainbows are only visible when it's rainy and sunny at the same time.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep43
programme.desc: It's time for a special visitor - It is a cold Winter afternoon, the trees are bare and the air is frosty. JoJo and Gran Gran wait for Mummy and Daddy to bring back a special visitor from the airport - Great Gran Gran!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Fluff Bread - Sarah and Duck help the baker bake Shoku-pan, a light and fluffy type of Japanese bread.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Moon Bow - Rainbow gets to experience the night for the first time.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep22
programme.desc: World of Tomorrow - When a pair of crooks steal plans for a great new invention, there is a high-speed chase to try and get them back and allow them to prove their worth.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Butterflies - Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Veg-O-Vision Song Contest - Veg-O-Vision Song Contest

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep29
programme.desc: The Difficult Badge - As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep30
programme.desc: The Cinema Badge - Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep31
programme.desc: The Getting Ready Badge - The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Mountain Gorillas, The Democratic Republic of the Congo - The Go Jetters race to save a family of mountain gorillas from traps left by hunters and also from a sneezy Grandmaster Glitch's germs.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Go Jetter or No Jetter? - Foz starts to think his team doesn't need him anymore. Can Tala convince him he still has what it takes to be a Go Jetter, or will he follow Glitch down a different path?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Mariana Trench: The Pacific Ocean - With the help of his hero Ron Allum, Lars plans to dive to the bottom of the Mariana Trench in a submersible called the Deep Sea Challenger.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes #2 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes #2 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 315: Muhammad vs. Della Maddalena
programme.desc: Main Event - The Octagon returns to Montreal, Quebec, Canada for the first time since 2015, and on May 11, fans at the Bell Centre will be treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event of UFC 315, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena. Perfect in seven trips to the Octagon, including five post-fight bonus-winning efforts, Della Maddalena is determined to bring a title down under, but in Muhammad, he will be facing a fighter who is undefeated for over six years while beating the best of the best at 170 pounds. In the co-main event, Valentina Shevchenko begins her second reign atop the flyweight division when she tackles top French contender Manon Fiorot
